text:
After installation i tried to start Apache.
I get message: The requested operation has failed.
Problem was in conflict about port 80.
I was running SKYPE on my PC who uses same port 80.

Solution: turn of SKYPE.
creator: hrvoje.jednakovic@gmail.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Correct, turn off skype.

Or configure skype to never use ports 80/443 which is a skype config option.

But this isn't a skype forum :)
